name: trust fall DEMO
description:
In the year 2054, trust has been commodified. 

Follow Moira as she navigates a strange world governed by the Horkos system; where the ability to convince others to trust you reaps tangible reward. 

Features: 

  • 5-7 minute long play-through
  • Original art and story
  • Available for Mac, Windows and Linux

Story, art and script: Hamizah Ismail
